www.sse.ci SIERPINSKI 09882886 ssentreprise912@gmail.com Abidjan - Treichville Sierpinski Entreprise - SSE sse912 SSE is a startup founded in March 2018 by Ivorian students from of the prestigious School of Technology ESATIC. \n Dynamism, creativity and know-how are our key words.\n We count in our ranks as passionate developers always in the scent of technology as crazy designers of ideas. A condensed technical and graphic art gathered in a single team that wants to respond brilliantly to your needs. \n SSE, the originility at your service.

About Help
Money Alert SSE (Sierpinski Enterprise) is an expense management application available on Sunday, October 14, 2018. \n It is at version 1.1. \n It was thought and designed by members of the Sierpinski Company: \n
\t - TACKA Walter Mickael \n \t - DIKE Jean Daniel \n \t - EDOUKOU RICHMOND EKI \n \t - ETTY FOULE ANGE AYMARD \n \t - KAKOU AKROU CEDRIC \n \t - ADOPO JORDAN SEBASTIEN LANDRY \n \t - Edy \n \t - AHISSAN OI SAMUEL \n \t - CISSOKO YANN
MONEY ALERT SSE aims to help its users to control their money and to establish a provisional budget.
failure of the operation Success of the operation
How can you help?
The earnings menu contains 2 tabs This tab contains a form that allows the user to enter the necessary information on his earnings. This tab contains a form that allows the user to enter the necessary information on his earnings.
The Expense menu contains 2 tabs This tab contains a form that allows the user to fill in the necessary information on his Expenses. This tab contains a form that allows the user to fill in the necessary information on his Expenses.
The Statistics menu contains 2 tabs
This tab presents your different sources of earnings in a pie chart in percentage(%).
This tab is used to present statistics about your expenses. \n They are divided into 2 categories: \n \t - useful expenses \n \t - the intimate expenses
The Budgets menu contains 2 tabs
This tab allows to inform your possible income of money in the period.
This tab is used to record planned expenses for the current period in order to develop the best control of your expenses.
